code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[gameId,setGameId]=useState(null);const[guess,setGuess]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[status,setStatus]=useState(null);const startGame=async level=>{try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:3000/',{level});setGameId(response.data._id);setMessage(response.data.message);}catch(error){setMessage(error.response.data.error);}};const makeGuess=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post(`http://localhost:3000/guess/${gameId}`,{guess:parseInt(guess)});setMessage(response.data.message);}catch(error){setMessage(error.response.data.error);}};const getStatus=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/${gameId}`);setStatus(response.data);}catch(error){setMessage(error.response.data.error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Guess The Numbers Game"}),!gameId?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>startGame('easy'),children:"Start Easy Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>startGame('hard'),children:"Start Hard Game"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:guess,onChange:e=>setGuess(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter your guess"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:makeGuess,children:"Submit Guess"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:getStatus,children:"Check Status"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),status&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",status.status]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Attempts left: ",status.attempts]})]})]});}export default App;
